name: The Town without Tomorrow
description:
HOW TO PLAY: Make it to the jump upgrade, then return to the start.
  • WASD - Move
  • SPACE - Jump (Hold for higher jump)
  • MOUSE1 - Fire Weapon
  • E - Switch Weapon
  • F - Purchase Health

A small town is stuck in a time loop that forces the residents to repeat the same day over and over. A sinister corporation who call themselves 'Tempus' have taken the town over and have started running tests that seem to be causing some instabilities. 

That's where you come in, ‘TE-1344’ or Ted for short. You have woken up in the town with no memory of your previous life, discover the secrets of your past and escape the never-ending day. Blast your way through hordes of enemies with a huge array of weapons and abilities that will aid your escape.

  • Use a multitude of weapons with their own unique upgrades.
  • Master abilities that devastate your foes.
  • Save the town or let it burn, your choice.
  • Take on multiple challenging bosses as you search for the truth.
  • Race against time to complete your goals, the clock is ticking.
  • Time resets when you die, but everything you collect doesn't.

Tempus isn't the only evil you will face, a more sinister foe is readying their grand scheme. Only you can save the town, are you up to the task?
